## Introduction

This week will introduce framework and evaluation metrics of supervised learning.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand the framework of supervised learning.
2. Understand the common metrics for regression and classification.
3. Appreciate the accuracy paradox and its implications.
4. Know how to pick the right metric for your problem.
